text: A person or entity aggrieved by a decision of the Office of Administrative Hearings may appeal the decision to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with Chapter 5 of Title 2 and pursuant to Chapter 18A of Title 2.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction in the punctuation.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-357, see notes following § 7-2341.01.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 7-242.

DC CODE § 7-2341.18

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
